EmailTemplate.name: SD_IntTeach_1
EmailTemplate.subject: International Teachers Heading to the UK
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
“I’m leaving on a jet plane, don’t know when I’ll be back again”
Jo Garlick & Mike Jones are leaving London Heathrow Friday 12th September. FINAL call to all Buckinghamshire County Council Schools, please submit your school’s 2018 vacancies. We have many Primary, English, Science & other subject teachers available.
Every Buckinghamshire school is invited to get involved. Your school will benefit from a local BCC representative vetting our Australian teachers in person. Supply Desk will be able to match teachers to your January 2018 vacancies.
Kathy
